fields.name: Photo
fields.description: Photo of Sam. There's a note on the back: 'Remember, if you get nervous, just pretend I'm in the front row :)'

fields.name: Hook
fields.description: Large metal hook. Probably used in a meat factory or for commercial fishing.

fields.name: Ticket
fields.description: Untorn orange ticket. Reminds you of riding The Zipper at the county fair.

fields.name: Coat
fields.description: Old goosedown coat. Looks awful, smells worse.... very warm.

fields.name: Pipe
fields.description: White PVC pipe, capped on both ends. Covered in TSA stickers. How many conferences did this thing go to?

fields.name: Bobbypin
fields.description: Bent bobbypin. Used for styling hair, or other nefarious activities.

fields.name: Tooth
fields.description: Human canine tooth. Surprisingly large. You start thinking of red kites and summer sun.

fields.name: Bean
fields.description: Single bean. You could do a lot with this.
